jql-function.name: Groups of currentuser Function
jql-function.description: Provides a JQL function to return list of current user groups. Example, if you have a Group Picker custom field, you can check if the selected group in the custom field is one of the groups that the current user belongs to using JQL function customfield in groupsOfCurrentUser()
